item.description: Samuel Johnson Lexicographer, writer, novelist, dramatist, journalist helped make English more popular his dictionary is an important work [[../../../Lives of the Most Eminent English Poets]] or Lives of The Poets examines 52 poets and has short biographies and critiques on each.

item.description: inventor invented the first electronic device for controlling current flow; the three-element “Audion” triode vacuum tube in 1906 started the Electronic Age

item.title: Clay Shirky
item.description: Clay Shirky (born 1964) is an American writer, consultant and teacher on the social and economic effects of Internet technologies and journalism.

item.title: WB Yeats
item.description: Irish poet - Irish Nationalist Symbolist Inspired by Pre-Raphaelites and William Blake poetry was a reaction to the naturalistic and realistic poetry of the Victorian age
